item.title: Roland FR-4X USB Drives
item.description: If you're a subscriber to this blog, thank you. This is almost certainly not interesting for you. If you're the owner of a Roland FR-4x digital accordion and trying to find which USB sticks can be used with your accordion I tried out every stick in my house with no luck. I learned: They need to be FAT32 (not ExFat) They need to be USB2.0 16GB seems to be the ideal size?
